query: How do I enable or disable mobile bands on FuriOS?
keyword: Enable Bands, disable bands, cellular bands
response: Go to Settings > Enable Bands, then select the band type you want to toggle (2G, 3G, 4G, etc.) and enable or disable it.

query: How do I turn off or on wifi?
keyword: wifi
response: To turn wifi on or off there are two ways. The first and easiest is swipe down from the top of the screen to show the quick view settings options and tap the wifi to toggle it off. It's color will change to disabled/off. The second way is to go to Settings > Wi-Fi and toggle on/off the the Wi-Fi.

query: How do I open the Settings app on FuriOS?
keyword: settings, open settings, access settings
response: You can open Settings by tapping the Settings icon in your app drawer, or by swiping down from the top of the screen to open the Quick Settings panel and tapping the gear icon.

query: How do I connect to a Wi-Fi network on FuriOS?
keyword: connect wifi, join wifi, wifi network
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi. Make sure Wi-Fi is enabled (toggle on). Available networks will appear under Visible Networks. Tap the network you want to connect to and enter the password if required.

query: How do I view my saved Wi-Fi networks?
keyword: saved wifi, saved networks, remembered wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Saved Networks. A popup will appear showing all your previously connected Wi-Fi networks. From here you can see and manage your saved connections.

query: How do I forget or remove a saved Wi-Fi network?
keyword: forget wifi, remove wifi, delete saved network
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap the connected or saved network to open its details, scroll down and tap Forget Connection... to remove it from your saved networks.

query: How do I connect to a hidden Wi-Fi network?
keyword: hidden wifi, hidden network, invisible wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Connect to Hidden Network.... In the popup, select your Wi-Fi adapter, enter the Network name, choose the Wi-Fi security type (None, WPA, WPA2, etc.), enter the password if needed, and tap Connect.

query: How do I turn on Wi-Fi hotspot on FuriOS?
keyword: wifi hotspot, hotspot, tethering, share internet, mobile hotspot
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Turn On Wi-Fi Hotspot.... A popup will appear where you can set the Network Name (default: furiphoneflx1s) and Password. Tap Turn On to enable the hotspot. Others can then connect to share your internet.

query: How do I change my Wi-Fi hotspot name and password?
keyword: hotspot name, hotspot password, change hotspot
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Turn On Wi-Fi Hotspot.... In the configuration popup, you can edit the Network Name and Password fields before turning on the hotspot.

query: How do I turn off Wi-Fi hotspot?
keyword: turn off hotspot, disable hotspot, stop hotspot
response: When the hotspot is active, go to Settings > Wi-Fi. You'll see Wi-Fi Hotspot Active with a QR code. Tap Turn Off Hotspot... to disable it and return to normal Wi-Fi mode.

query: How do others connect to my Wi-Fi hotspot?
keyword: connect to hotspot, join hotspot, scan qr hotspot
response: When your hotspot is active, a QR code is displayed on the Settings > Wi-Fi screen. Other devices can scan this QR code to automatically connect, or they can manually search for your hotspot name and enter the password.

query: How do I enable Airplane Mode on FuriOS?
keyword: airplane mode, flight mode, disable mobile broadband
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and toggle on Airplane Mode. This disables mobile broadband. You can also access Airplane Mode from the Quick Settings by swiping down from the top of the screen.

query: How do I view Wi-Fi network details on FuriOS?
keyword: wifi details, network info, wifi information, ip address
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap on a connected network. The Details tab shows: Signal Strength, Security type, IPv4 Address, IPv6 Address, Hardware Address (MAC), Supported Frequencies (2.4 GHz/5 GHz), Default Route, and DNS.

query: How do I find my IP address on FuriOS?
keyword: ip address, ipv4, ipv6, network address
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and view the Details tab. Your IPv4 Address and IPv6 Address are displayed there along with the Default Route and DNS settings.

query: How do I find my MAC address on FuriOS?
keyword: mac address, hardware address, wifi mac
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and view the Details tab. Your Hardware Address (MAC address) is displayed there.

query: How do I set a Wi-Fi connection to connect automatically?
keyword: auto connect wifi, automatic wifi, connect automatically
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and in the Details tab, enable the Connect automatically checkbox. The device will automatically connect to this network when in range.

query: How do I share a Wi-Fi connection with other users on FuriOS?
keyword: share wifi, wifi other users, multi user wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and in the Details tab, enable Make available to other users. This allows other user accounts on the device to use this saved connection.

query: How do I set a Wi-Fi network as metered on FuriOS?
keyword: metered connection, data limit, metered wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and in the Details tab, enable Metered connection. This indicates the connection has data limits or can incur charges. Software updates and large downloads will not start automatically on metered connections.

query: How do I view or change Wi-Fi identity settings?
keyword: wifi identity, bssid, cloned mac, mac address randomization
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the Identity tab. Here you can view and configure: BSSID, MAC Address, and Cloned Address settings.

query: How do I configure a static IP address on Wi-Fi?
keyword: static ip, manual ip, fixed ip address, dhcp off
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 tab, and change IPv4 Method from Automatic (DHCP) to Manual. Then enter your desired Address, Netmask, DNS, and Routes.

query: What IPv4 methods are available for Wi-Fi on FuriOS?
keyword: ipv4 methods, dhcp, manual ip, shared
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the IPv4 tab. Available methods are: Automatic (DHCP) - gets IP automatically, Manual - set static IP, and Shared to other computers - share connection.

query: How do I set custom DNS servers for Wi-Fi?
keyword: custom dns, change dns, dns settings
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 or IPv6 tab. In the DNS field, enter your preferred DNS server addresses. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas.

query: How do I configure IPv6 settings on Wi-Fi?
keyword: ipv6 settings, ipv6 configure, ipv6 manual
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the IPv6 tab. Choose your method: Automatic, Automatic, DHCP, Link-Local Only, Manual, Shared to other devices, or Disable.

query: What IPv6 methods are available for Wi-Fi on FuriOS?
keyword: ipv6 methods, ipv6 options, ipv6 modes
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi > [Network] > IPv6. Methods include: Automatic, Automatic, DHCP, Link-Local Only, Manual (enter Address, Prefix, Gateway), Shared to other devices, and Disable (turn off IPv6).

query: How do I disable IPv6 on FuriOS?
keyword: disable ipv6, turn off ipv6, ipv6 off
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv6 tab, and set IPv6 Method to Disable. Tap Apply to save the changes.

query: How do I only use a Wi-Fi connection for its own network resources?
keyword: network only, local resources, no default route
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 or IPv6 tab, and enable Use this connection only for resources on its network. This prevents the connection from becoming your default route.

query: How do I view or change Wi-Fi security settings?
keyword: wifi security, wifi password, wpa, wpa2, wpa3
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the Security tab. Here you can see the security type (e.g., WPA & WPA2 Personal) and update the password. Toggle Show password to reveal the current password.

query: How do I change my saved Wi-Fi password?
keyword: change wifi password, update wifi password, wrong password
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on the saved network, select the Security tab, enter the new password in the Password field, and tap Apply to save.

query: How do I access Quick Settings on FuriOS?
keyword: quick settings, notification panel, swipe down, toggles
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open the Quick Settings panel. Here you can toggle Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Torch, Hotspot, and view notifications. Swipe down again to expand for more options.

query: How do I turn on the flashlight/torch on FuriOS?
keyword: flashlight, torch, led light
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open Quick Settings, then tap the Torch icon to turn on the flashlight. Tap it again to turn it off.

query: How do I clear notifications on FuriOS?
keyword: clear notifications, dismiss notifications, remove notifications
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open the notification panel. Tap Clear all at the top right to dismiss all notifications at once. You can also swipe individual notifications left or right to dismiss them.

query: How do I quickly toggle Hotspot from the notification panel?
keyword: quick hotspot, toggle hotspot, hotspot shortcut
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open Quick Settings. Tap the Hotspot icon to quickly toggle it on or off without going into Settings.

query: What quick toggles are available in FuriOS notification panel?
keyword: quick toggles, notification toggles, quick access
response: The Quick Settings panel (swipe down from top) includes toggles for: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Torch (flashlight), Hotspot, and shows the current date and battery percentage.

query: Where are screenshots saved on FuriOS?
keyword: screenshot location, screenshot folder, saved screenshots
response: Screenshots on FuriOS are saved to /home/furios/Pictures/Screenshots/. When you take a screenshot, a notification appears showing the full path to the saved file.

query: What tabs are available when viewing Wi-Fi network settings?
keyword: wifi tabs, network settings tabs, wifi options
response: When you tap on a Wi-Fi network in Settings, you can access these tabs: Details (connection info), Identity (BSSID, MAC), IPv4 (IP configuration), IPv6 (IPv6 configuration), and Security (password and encryption).

query: How do I access Network settings on FuriOS?
keyword: network settings, vpn, proxy
response: Go to Settings > Network. Here you can configure VPN connections and Proxy settings.

query: How do I set up a VPN on FuriOS?
keyword: vpn, add vpn, vpn setup
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN and tap the + button. Choose your VPN type: L2TP, OpenVPN, PPTP, SSTP, Cisco Compatible (vpnc), or WireGuard. You can also import a VPN configuration from a file.

query: What VPN types are supported on FuriOS?
keyword: vpn types, vpn protocols, vpn options
response: FuriOS supports: L2TP (Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol), OpenVPN, PPTP (Point-to-Point Tunneling), SSTP (Secure Socket Tunneling), Cisco Compatible VPN (vpnc), and WireGuard. You can also import VPN configurations from a file.

query: How do I set up WireGuard VPN on FuriOS?
keyword: wireguard, wireguard vpn, wireguard setup
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN, tap +, and select WireGuard. Enter the Connection Name, Interface Name, Private Key, Listen Port (default 51820), and configure your Peers. You can also set MTU and fwmark values.

query: How do I configure a network proxy on FuriOS?
keyword: proxy, network proxy, proxy settings
response: Go to Settings > Network > Proxy. Enable Network Proxy and set the Configuration to Automatic. Enter the Configuration URL for your proxy server.

query: How do I import a VPN configuration file?
keyword: import vpn, vpn file, vpn config file
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN, tap +, and select Import from file... to import an existing VPN configuration file.

query: How do I access Mobile Network settings?
keyword: mobile network, cellular, mobile data, sim
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network. Here you can manage Mobile Data, Data Roaming, Enabled Bands, IP Configuration, Access Point Names (APN), MMS settings, SIM Lock, and view Modem Details.

query: How do I turn on mobile data on FuriOS?
keyword: mobile data, cellular data, data on
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network and toggle on Mobile Data to access data using your mobile network.

query: How do I enable data roaming on FuriOS?
keyword: data roaming, roaming, international data
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network and toggle on Data Roaming to use mobile data when roaming on other networks.

query: How do I configure MMS settings on FuriOS?
keyword: mms, multimedia messaging, mms settings, picture messages
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > Multimedia Messaging Service. Enter the Message Proxy, Message Center (MMSC) URL, Access Point Name (APN), Username, and Password for your carrier.

query: How do I lock my SIM card with a PIN?
keyword: sim lock, sim pin, lock sim
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > SIM Lock and toggle on Lock SIM with PIN. You'll need to enter a PIN that will be required each time the device starts.

query: How do I view modem details on FuriOS?
keyword: modem details, imei, network status, signal strength
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > Modem Details. This shows Carrier, Network Type (e.g., LTE), Signal Strength, Network Status, IMS Registration, Voice/SMS capability, Manufacturer, Model, Firmware Version, and IMEI.

query: How do I find my IMEI number on FuriOS?
keyword: imei, imei number, device id
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > Modem Details. Your IMEI number is displayed at the bottom of the modem information screen.

query: How do I select a mobile network manually?
keyword: network selection, manual network, carrier selection
response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > Network. Disable Automatic to manually select from available networks.

query: How do I connect a Bluetooth device to FuriOS?
keyword: bluetooth, pair bluetooth, connect bluetooth
response: Go to Settings > Bluetooth. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled. Available devices will appear in the list - tap a device to pair and connect.

query: Can I receive files via Bluetooth on FuriOS?
keyword: bluetooth file transfer, receive files bluetooth
response: Yes! Go to Settings > Bluetooth and ensure Bluetooth is on. Your device is now visible and available for Bluetooth file transfers. Transferred files are placed in the Downloads folder.

query: How do I change the display scale on FuriOS?
keyword: display scale, screen scale, zoom, ui size
response: Go to Settings > Displays and adjust the Scale dropdown. Options include 100%, 125%, 150%, 175%, and 200%.

query: What is the FLX1s screen resolution and refresh rate?
keyword: screen resolution, refresh rate, display specs
response: The FLX1s has a 720 x 1600 resolution with a 90.00 Hz refresh rate. View this in Settings > Displays.

query: How do I enable Night Light on FuriOS?
keyword: night light, blue light filter, eye strain, warm screen
response: Go to Settings > Displays > Night Light. Toggle on Night Light and adjust the Color Temperature slider. Night light makes the screen color warmer to help prevent eye strain and sleeplessness.

query: How do I enable wake gestures on FuriOS?
keyword: wake gesture, tilt to wake, lift to wake
response: Go to Settings > Displays and toggle on Wake Gesture to enable the wake gesture sensor. You can also enable Tilt To Wake Gesture to wake the screen by tilting the device.

query: What display customization options are available on FuriOS?
keyword: display customization, vivid mode, hdr, sharpness
response: Go to Settings > Displays > Display Customization. Options include: PQ Mode (vivid), Display Color, Content Color, Content Color Video, Sharpness, Dynamic Contrast, Dynamic Sharpness, Display Gamma, ISO Adaptive Sharpness, Ultra Resolution, and Video HDR.

query: How do I change the sound output device on FuriOS?
keyword: sound output, speaker, audio output, earpiece
response: Go to Settings > Sound and change the Output Device dropdown. Options include: Output to speaker, Parking port, Output to earpiece, and Null Output.

query: How do I change the microphone input on FuriOS?
keyword: microphone, input device, mic settings
response: Go to Settings > Sound and change the Input Device dropdown. Options include: Input from builtin mic, Parking port, Input from back mic, Input from voice call, and Null input.

query: How do I change the alert sound on FuriOS?
keyword: alert sound, notification sound, system sounds
response: Go to Settings > Sound > Alert Sound. Choose from: None, Click, String, Swing, or Hum.

query: How do I test my speakers on FuriOS?
keyword: test speakers, speaker test, audio test
response: Go to Settings > Sound and tap Test... next to Output. A popup will appear allowing you to select and test each speaker.

query: How do I change power mode on FuriOS?
keyword: power mode, performance mode, battery saver, power saving
response: Go to Settings > Power. Choose from: Performance (high performance and power usage), Balanced (standard), or Power Saver (reduced performance and power usage).

query: How do I show battery percentage on FuriOS?
keyword: battery percentage, battery level, show percentage
response: Go to Settings > Power and toggle on Show Battery Percentage to show the exact charge level in the top bar.

query: How do I enable automatic screen brightness on FuriOS?
keyword: auto brightness, automatic brightness, adaptive brightness
response: Go to Settings > Power and toggle on Automatic Screen Brightness to adjust screen brightness based on the surrounding light.

query: What is Batman power management?
keyword: batman, batman power, power management
response: Batman is advanced power management for FuriOS. Go to Settings > Power > Batman Power Management to access Batman Power Saving Options for advanced power control.

query: How do I change the screen blank delay on FuriOS?
keyword: screen timeout, screen blank, auto off
response: Go to Settings > Power and adjust Automatic Screen Blank. Set the Delay (e.g., 5 minutes) for how long before the screen turns off after inactivity.

query: How do I change the theme on FuriOS?
keyword: theme, dark mode, light mode, appearance
response: Go to Settings > Appearance. Under Style, choose Default or Dark mode.

query: How do I change the accent color on FuriOS?
keyword: accent color, theme color, color scheme
response: Go to Settings > Appearance and select an Accent Color from the color palette to customize the system highlight color.

query: How do I change the wallpaper on FuriOS?
keyword: wallpaper, background, home screen background
response: Go to Settings > Appearance and tap + Add Picture... under Background to select a custom wallpaper image.

query: How do I view installed apps on FuriOS?
keyword: installed apps, app list, apps
response: Go to Settings > Apps. You'll see a searchable list of all installed applications. Tap an app to view its details and permissions.

query: How do I set default apps on FuriOS?
keyword: default apps, default browser, default email
response: Go to Settings > Apps > Default Apps. Here you can set default apps for: Web, Mail, Calendar, Music, Video, Photos, Calls, and SMS.

query: How do I configure removable media autoplay on FuriOS?
keyword: media autostart, autoplay, removable media
response: Go to Settings > Apps > Default Apps and scroll to Removable Media. Toggle Media Autostart and set actions for CD Audio, DVD Video, Music Player, Photos, Software, and Other Media Types.

query: How do I hide an app from the app grid on FuriOS?
keyword: hide app, remove from launcher, hide from grid
response: Go to Settings > Apps, select the app, and toggle on Hide in App Grid to remove it from the app grid.

query: How do I enable Do Not Disturb on FuriOS?
keyword: do not disturb, dnd, silent mode
response: Go to Settings > Notifications and toggle on Do Not Disturb to silence notifications.

query: How do I configure app notifications on FuriOS?
keyword: app notifications, notification settings, notification banners
response: Go to Settings > Notifications and select an app. You can configure: Show in notifications list, Sound, Show Banners, Show Content, and Lock Screen settings for each app.

query: How do I add a Google account on FuriOS?
keyword: google account, add google, gmail
response: Go to Settings > Online Accounts and tap Google. Sign in with your browser to connect email, calendar, contacts, and files.

query: How do I add a Nextcloud account on FuriOS?
keyword: nextcloud, add nextcloud, cloud storage
response: Go to Settings > Online Accounts and tap Nextcloud. Enter your server address (e.g., example.com or 192.168.0.82) to connect calendar, contacts, and files.

query: How do I add a Microsoft 365 account on FuriOS?
keyword: microsoft 365, office 365, outlook
response: Go to Settings > Online Accounts and tap Microsoft 365. You can connect using your organization account for email, calendars, contacts, and files.

query: How do I add an IMAP email account on FuriOS?
keyword: imap, email account, smtp, email server
response: Go to Settings > Online Accounts > Email Server (IMAP/SMTP). Enter your Name, Email, Password, and configure IMAP/SMTP server settings with encryption options.

query: What online accounts can I add on FuriOS?
keyword: online accounts, cloud accounts, sync accounts
response: FuriOS supports: Nextcloud, Google, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Exchange, Email Server (IMAP/SMTP), Calendar, Contacts and Files (WebDAV), and Enterprise Authentication (Kerberos).

query: How do I share media to other devices on FuriOS?
keyword: media sharing, dlna, stream media
response: Go to Settings > Sharing. Enable Media Sharing to stream music, photos, and videos to devices on your current network.

query: How do I change the device name on FuriOS?
keyword: device name, hostname, phone name
response: Go to Settings > Sharing and edit the Device Name field to change how your device appears on the network.

query: How do I change the primary mouse button on FuriOS?
keyword: mouse button, left handed mouse, primary button
response: Go to Settings > Mouse & Touchpad. Under Primary Button, choose Left or Right to set the order of physical buttons on mice and touchpads.

query: How do I add a keyboard input source or language?
keyword: keyboard layout, input source, language keyboard
response: Go to Settings > Keyboard and tap + Add Input Source under Input Sources to add a new keyboard layout or input method.

query: How do I switch keyboard input sources on FuriOS?
keyword: switch keyboard, change language, input switching
response: Use the Super+Space keyboard shortcut to switch input sources. You can change this in Settings > Keyboard > View and Customize Shortcuts.

query: How do I configure the Compose key on FuriOS?
keyword: compose key, special characters, accents
response: Go to Settings > Keyboard > Compose Key. Enable it and choose a key (Right Alt, Left Super, Right Super, Menu key, Ctrl, Caps Lock, etc.). Use compose sequences like compose+o+c for Â©.

query: How do I view keyboard shortcuts on FuriOS?
keyword: keyboard shortcuts, hotkeys, key bindings
response: Go to Settings > Keyboard > View and Customize Shortcuts. Categories include: Accessibility, Launchers, Navigation, Screenshots, Sound and Media, System, Typing, and Windows.

query: How do I configure the Assistant button on FuriOS?
keyword: assistant button, hardware button, side button
response: Go to Settings > Assistant button. Configure actions for Short, Long, and Double press gestures. Options include: Toggle flashlight, Open camera, Take picture, Take screenshot, Send Tab/Back/Escape key, and Manual autorotation.

query: What actions can I assign to the Assistant button?
keyword: assistant button actions, button functions
response: The Assistant button supports: No Action (Disable), Toggle flashlight, Open camera, Take picture, Take screenshot, Send Tab key, Manual autorotation, Send Back key, and Send Escape key.

query: How do I start the Android container on FuriOS?
keyword: android, start android, android apps, andromeda
response: Go to Settings > Android and tap Start Android Container. You can enable Auto start to automatically start Android on boot.

query: Can I run Android apps on FuriOS?
keyword: android apps, play store, android support
response: Yes! FuriOS runs Android apps via a container. Go to Settings > Android to manage the Android container. You can install apps from Aurora Store or F-Droid. The Android version is LineageOS 20.

query: How do I install Android apps on FuriOS?
keyword: aurora store, f-droid, android app install
response: Open Aurora Store or F-Droid inside the Android container to browse and install Android apps. Once installed, app icons automatically appear in your Phosh app drawer alongside native Linux apps - no extra steps needed!

query: How do I share files between Linux and Android on FuriOS?
keyword: shared folder, android files, linux android share
response: Go to Settings > Android and enable Shared Folder to enable file sharing between the Linux host and Android guest.

query: How do I enable NFC for Android apps on FuriOS?
keyword: nfc android, nfc access
response: Go to Settings > Android and enable NFC Access to allow Android apps to access NFC inside the container.

query: How do I see which Android apps are installed on FuriOS?
keyword: installed android apps, android app list
response: Go to Settings > Android and expand Installed Apps to see all Android apps installed in the container.

query: How do I wipe Android data on FuriOS?
keyword: wipe android, reset android, clear android data
response: Go to Settings > Android and tap Wipe data at the bottom to reset the Android container and clear all Android app data.

query: How do I change the USB mode on FuriOS?
keyword: usb mode, mtp mode, file transfer
response: Go to Settings > USB. Options include: MTP (file transfer), RNDIS (Ethernet over USB), and CD-ROM mode. You can also set the USB Power Role.

query: What is RNDIS mode on FuriOS?
keyword: rndis, ethernet over usb, usb tethering
response: RNDIS creates an Ethernet network over USB between your phone and computer. Enable it at Settings > USB. This allows SSH access and network sharing via USB cable.

query: What is USB CD-ROM mode on FuriOS?
keyword: cd-rom mode, usb cdrom, virtual cdrom
response: CD-ROM mode makes your phone appear as a virtual CD-ROM drive to the computer. Enable at Settings > USB and select a CD-ROM image file.

query: How do I configure GPS on FuriOS?
keyword: gps, location, supl server
response: Go to Settings > GPS. You can configure the SUPL Server for assisted GPS. The default is supl.google.com.

query: How do I encrypt my device on FuriOS?
keyword: encryption, device encryption, luks
response: Go to Settings > Encryption to manage device encryption. You can encrypt your device storage for additional security.

query: How do I add a printer on FuriOS?
keyword: printer, printing, add printer
response: Go to Settings > Printers and tap Add a Printer... to set up a new printer.

query: How do I enable the screen reader on FuriOS?
keyword: screen reader, orca, accessibility, blind
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Seeing and enable Screen Reader to have on-screen items read aloud.

query: How do I enable high contrast mode on FuriOS?
keyword: high contrast, visibility, accessibility
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Seeing and enable High Contrast to make text and windows more visible.

query: How do I make text larger on FuriOS?
keyword: large text, bigger text, text size accessibility
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Seeing and enable Large Text to increase the size of text throughout the system.

query: How do I change the cursor size on FuriOS?
keyword: cursor size, pointer size, mouse cursor
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Seeing and adjust Cursor Size to make the mouse pointer easier to see.

query: How do I enable visual alerts for sounds on FuriOS?
keyword: visual alerts, flash alerts, deaf accessibility
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Hearing and enable Visual Alerts to flash the screen when an alert sound occurs.

query: How do I enable sticky keys on FuriOS?
keyword: sticky keys, accessibility keyboard, one finger typing
response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Typing and enable Sticky Keys to treat modifier key sequences as key combinations.

query: What accessibility options are available on FuriOS?
keyword: accessibility, a11y options, special needs
response: FuriOS offers accessibility options in Settings > Accessibility: Seeing (screen reader, high contrast, large text, cursor size), Hearing (over-amplification, visual alerts), Typing (screen keyboard, repeat keys, cursor blinking, sticky/slow/bounce keys), and Pointing & Clicking (locate pointer, click assist, double-click delay).

query: How do I set a screen lock on FuriOS?
keyword: screen lock, password, pin lock, pattern
response: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Lock. Choose Password (letters, numbers, symbols) or PIN (numbers only) to secure your device.

query: How do I enable location services on FuriOS?
keyword: location, gps, location services
response: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services and turn it on. You can also control which apps have access to your location.

query: How do I clear file history on FuriOS?
keyword: file history, recent files, privacy
response: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > File History & Trash. Toggle File History off to stop tracking, or tap Clear History to delete recent file history.

query: How do I disable the camera on FuriOS?
keyword: disable camera, camera privacy, camera access
response: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Camera and turn off camera access to prevent all apps from using the camera.

query: How do I change the region or language on FuriOS?
keyword: region, language, locale
response: Go to Settings > System > Region & Language. Set your Language, Formats (dates, times, numbers), and manage Input Sources.

query: How do I change the date and time on FuriOS?
keyword: date, time, timezone
response: Go to Settings > System > Date & Time. Enable Automatic Date & Time or set manually. You can also change the Time Zone and toggle 24-hour Time.

query: How do I enable SSH on FuriOS?
keyword: ssh, remote access, secure shell
response: Go to Settings > System > Secure Shell and enable SSH. If the option is not available, install OpenSSH server by running sudo apt install openssh-server in the terminal.

query: How do I connect to my device via SSH?
keyword: ssh connect, remote terminal, ssh into phone
response: First enable SSH on your device. Then either: 1) Connect via Wi-Fi using ssh user@phone-ip-address, or 2) Enable RNDIS at Settings > USB for USB tethering, then SSH to the phone's USB network IP (typically 10.15.19.82). The default username is furios.

query: How do I check what version of FuriOS I have?
keyword: version, furios version, software version, about
response: Go to Settings > System > About to see your FuriOS version, hardware info (MediaTek Dimensity 900, Mali-G68 MC4 GPU, 7.5 GiB RAM), and device name.

query: How do I check for software updates on FuriOS?
keyword: software updates, update phone, system updates
response: Go to Settings > System > Software Updates or open Upgrades from the app drawer to check for and install updates.

query: How do I add a user on FuriOS?
keyword: add user, multiple users, user account
response: Go to Settings > System > Users and tap Add User... to create a new user account. You can also enable Automatic Login from this screen.

query: What is Mobile Settings on FuriOS?
keyword: mobile settings, phosh settings, phone settings
response: Mobile Settings is a separate app from the main Settings that controls Phosh-specific features like top bar customization, convergence mode, on-screen keyboard layouts, and experimental features.

query: How do I customize the quick settings on FuriOS?
keyword: quick settings, top bar, toggles customize
response: Open Mobile Settings > Top Bar. Toggle which quick settings appear: Docked/Undocked mode, Dark mode, Night light, Camera, Microphone, Wi-Fi, Wwan (cellular), Bluetooth, Rotation Lock, Battery, Quiet/DND, Flashlight, VPN, Location, Screenshots, and more.

query: How do I customize the app overview favorites on FuriOS?
keyword: favorites, overview, dock apps
response: Open Mobile Settings > Overview. Tap Favorites to add/remove apps that appear in your bottom favorites bar.

query: How do I use haptic feedback on FuriOS?
keyword: haptic, vibration feedback, feedback profiles
response: Open Mobile Settings > Feedback. Choose from Full, Silent, or Quiet profiles. Full enables haptic feedback for keyboard typing and other actions.

query: How do I change the UI scaling on FuriOS?
keyword: scaling, ui scale, display scaling, compositor
response: Open Mobile Settings > Compositor. Adjust the Scale slider to change overall UI scaling.

query: How do I add widgets to the lock screen on FuriOS?
keyword: lockscreen widgets, lock screen customize
response: Open Mobile Settings > Lockscreen. Tap Lockscreen Widgets to add widgets for clocks, weather, or other information that display on your lock screen.

query: How do I enable convergence mode on FuriOS?
keyword: convergence, desktop mode, dock mode, hub
response: Open Mobile Settings > Convergence. Enable Enable docked mode to use desktop mode when connected to the Convergence Hub (HUB1) or an external display.

query: How do I change the on-screen keyboard layout on FuriOS?
keyword: osk, keyboard layout, squeekboard
response: Open Mobile Settings > On Screen Keyboard. Choose from available layouts like US, Terminal, German, French, Spanish, and others.

query: How do I open or close the on-screen keyboard manually on FuriOS?
keyword: osk toggle, show keyboard, hide keyboard
response: Hold down the white bar at the bottom of the screen until the keyboard pops open or closed.

query: How do I enable emergency alerts on FuriOS?
keyword: emergency alerts, amber alerts, wireless alerts
response: Open Mobile Settings > Emergency Alerts to configure wireless emergency alerts like Amber Alerts, Extreme Threats, and Severe Threats.

query: How do I view sensor data on FuriOS?
keyword: sensors, accelerometer, gyroscope
response: Open Mobile Settings > Sensors to see real-time data from your device's sensors including accelerometer, gyroscope, proximity sensor, and more.

query: What experimental features are available on FuriOS?
keyword: experimental, beta features, experimental settings
response: Open Mobile Settings > Experimental to access beta features that may change or be removed in future updates.

query: What is Batman on FuriOS?
keyword: batman, battery manager, power saving
response: Batman is the advanced battery manager for FuriOS. It controls power-saving features including CPU governors, offline cores, memory autosuspend, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth powersave, and USB autosuspend to extend battery life.

query: How do I enable CPU power saving on FuriOS?
keyword: cpu governor, power saving, battery life
response: Open the Batman app and enable Offline (turns off some CPU cores when idle), Governor Powersave (uses powersave governor on all CPUs), or GPU Powersave to reduce power consumption.

query: How do I make phone calls on FuriOS?
keyword: phone calls, dialer, call app
response: Open the Calls app (Phone). Use the dial pad to enter numbers, or tap Contacts to call a saved contact. The app also shows call history.

query: How do I add a VoIP/SIP account on FuriOS?
keyword: voip, sip account, internet calling
response: Open the Calls app, go to menu > Preferences > VoIP Accounts, and tap Add Account. Enter your SIP server, user, password, port, protocol (UDP/TCP/TLS), and transport.

query: How do I send text messages on FuriOS?
keyword: sms, text messages, messaging
response: Open the Chats app to send and receive SMS/MMS messages. Tap the + button to start a new conversation.

query: How do I set an alarm on FuriOS?
keyword: alarm, wake up, alarm clock
response: Open the Clocks app and go to the Alarms tab. Tap + New to create a new alarm. Set the time, repeat days, and alarm name.

query: How do I set a timer on FuriOS?
keyword: timer, countdown, kitchen timer
response: Open the Clocks app and go to the Timer tab. Set the hours, minutes, seconds and tap Start.

query: How do I use the stopwatch on FuriOS?
keyword: stopwatch, lap timer
response: Open the Clocks app and go to the Stopwatch tab. Tap Start to begin timing, Lap to record lap times, and Stop to stop.

query: How do I add a world clock on FuriOS?
keyword: world clock, time zones, international time
response: Open the Clocks app and go to the World tab. Tap + New to add a city and see its local time.

query: How do I check the weather on FuriOS?
keyword: weather, forecast, temperature
response: Open the Weather app to see current conditions and forecast. Add locations using the search function.

query: How do I check CPU and memory usage on FuriOS?
keyword: cpu usage, memory usage, system monitor
response: Open the Usage app. View tabs for Performance (CPU, memory graphs), Storage (disk usage), and Power (battery and power info).

query: How do I check storage space on FuriOS?
keyword: storage, disk space, free space
response: Open the Usage app and go to the Storage tab to see total capacity, used space, and available space.

query: What is the Convergence Hub (HUB1)?
keyword: convergence hub, hub1, dock, desktop mode
response: The Convergence Hub (HUB1) ($70 USD) enables Linux desktop convergence. Ports: 1x Full HDMI, 1x Mini HDMI, 1x USB-A (3.2), 2x USB-C (3.2), 1x USB-C PD 100W (3.0), 1x RJ-45 1Gbps Ethernet, 1x 3.5mm headphone/mic jack. Requires the External Displays app. Learn more at furilabs.com/shop/hub1/

query: How do I set up the Convergence Hub?
keyword: hub setup, convergence setup, hub1 setup
response: Connect power to the USB-C PD 100W port (required). Connect your device to any USB-C (3.2) port. Connect an external display via either the Full HDMI or Mini HDMI port. Open the External Displays app to configure your display. The hub will charge your phone while providing desktop mode!

query: Can I use other USB-C hubs with FuriOS?
keyword: third party hub, displaylink, other dock, usb-c hub
response: Other USB-C hubs with DisplayLink chips may or may not work. FuriLabs focuses on the HUB1 to ensure a perfect convergence experience. For guaranteed compatibility, we recommend using the official Convergence Hub (HUB1).

query: How do I access USB drives on the Convergence Hub?
keyword: usb drive, usb storage, flash drive, hub storage
response: Plug USB storage into the Hub's USB-A or USB-C ports. The drive will automatically appear in the Portfolio file manager app - no manual mounting needed!

query: How do I use FuriOS with an external display?
keyword: external display, monitor, hdmi, usb-c display
response: Connect your device to an external display via the Convergence Hub (HUB1). Open the External Displays app to configure your display, or use Mobile Settings > Convergence to enable docked mode.

query: How do I configure external displays on FuriOS?
keyword: external display settings, monitor settings, display arrangement
response: Open the External Displays app to configure resolution, refresh rate, orientation, and display arrangement for connected monitors.

query: How do I take a photo on FuriOS?
keyword: camera, take photo, picture
response: Open the Camera app. Tap the shutter button to take a photo. Switch between front and rear cameras using the camera flip button.

query: How do I record video on FuriOS?
keyword: video, record video, video camera
response: Open the Camera app and switch to video mode. Tap the record button to start recording.

query: How do I view my photos on FuriOS?
keyword: gallery, photos, pictures, view photos
response: Open the Gallery app (or Image Viewer) to browse and view your photos and videos.

query: How do I install apps on FuriOS?
keyword: install apps, app store, software
response: Open the Software app (GNOME Software) to browse and install Linux apps. The Software app handles all permissions automatically - just click Install and enter your password when prompted. For Android apps, use Aurora Store or F-Droid in the Android container.

query: How do I install packages from the terminal on FuriOS?
keyword: apt, apt-get, terminal install, command line install
response: Use sudo apt install package-name to install packages from the command line. For example: sudo apt install htop. The sudo command grants administrator privileges and will prompt for your password. Use sudo apt update first to refresh the package list.

query: What is sudo on FuriOS?
keyword: sudo, root, administrator, superuser
response: sudo (superuser do) lets you run commands with administrator privileges. Prefix any command with sudo to run it as root, e.g., sudo apt update. You'll be prompted for your user password. The Software app uses sudo automatically behind the scenes.

query: How do I manage files on FuriOS?
keyword: file manager, files, folders, browse files
response: Open Files (Nautilus) or Portfolio to browse, copy, move, and manage files on your device.

query: How do I use the calculator on FuriOS?
keyword: calculator, math, calculate
response: Open the Calculator app for basic and scientific calculations.

query: How do I use the calendar on FuriOS?
keyword: calendar, events, schedule
response: Open the Calendar app to view and manage your schedule. Add events by tapping on a date and entering event details.

query: What is Phosh on FuriOS?
keyword: phosh, phone shell, mobile shell
response: Phosh (Phone Shell) is the open-source graphical shell that powers FuriOS's mobile interface. Developed at phosh.org, it provides the home screen, app drawer, notifications, and quick settings. It's built on GTK and Wayland.

query: What are the FLX1s hardware specifications?
keyword: specs, specifications, hardware, flx1s
response: The FLX1s is a flagship Linux phone with MediaTek Dimensity 900 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, 6.7" 90Hz display, triple cameras, 5G, and hardware privacy switches. Learn more at furilabs.com/shop/flx1s/

query: What CPU does the FLX1s have?
keyword: cpu, processor, chip, soc, chipset
response: The FLX1s uses the MediaTek Dimensity 900 SoC with 2x Cortex-A78 cores at 2.4GHz and 6x Cortex-A55 cores at 2.0GHz. It's a powerful 6nm octa-core processor.

query: What GPU does the FLX1s have?
keyword: gpu, graphics, mali, gaming
response: The FLX1s has a Mali-G68 MC4 GPU for graphics processing.

query: How much RAM does the FLX1s have?
keyword: ram, memory, how much ram
response: The FLX1s has 8GB LPDDR4X RAM.

query: How much storage does the FLX1s have?
keyword: storage, internal storage, how much storage, gb
response: The FLX1s has 128GB UFS internal storage. You can also expand storage with a MicroSD card up to 1TB.

query: What cameras does the FLX1s have?
keyword: camera, cameras, megapixel, photo quality
response: The FLX1s has three cameras: 20MP rear camera (f/1.8), 13MP front camera (f/2.0), and a 2MP macro camera (f/2.4).

query: What is the FLX1s battery capacity?
keyword: battery, battery life, mah, charging
response: The FLX1s has a 5000mAh Li-Po battery with wired USB-C charging.

query: What cellular bands does the FLX1s support?
keyword: bands, lte, 5g, cellular, network bands

query: Does the FLX1s support 5G?
keyword: 5g, 5g support, 5g network
response: Yes! The FLX1s supports 5G and 5G ENDC. It covers many 5G NR bands including n1, n2, n3, n5, n7, n8, n12, n20, n25, n28, n38, n40, n41, n48, n66, n71, n77, n78, and n79.

query: Does the FLX1s have dual SIM?
keyword: dual sim, sim slots, two sims, sim card, esim
response: The FLX1s has 2 SIM slots, but currently only SIM1 is enabled due to lack of app support. The SD card goes in SIM2. While built-in eSIM is not available, you can use eSIM adapters like jmp.chat in SIM1.

query: What WiFi and Bluetooth does the FLX1s support?
keyword: wifi, bluetooth, wireless
response: The FLX1s supports WiFi 6.0 (802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax) and Bluetooth 5.2 with A2DP and LE.

query: Does the FLX1s have a MicroSD slot?
keyword: microsd, sd card, expandable storage
response: Yes, the FLX1s has a MicroSD slot supporting cards up to 1TB.

query: What are the FLX1s dimensions and weight?
keyword: dimensions, weight, size, how big
response: The FLX1s measures 170mm x 76mm x 8mm and weighs 201g. Box dimensions: 180mm x 90mm x 28mm (total shipping weight: 321g).

query: What screen does the FLX1s have?
keyword: screen, display, resolution, refresh rate
response: The FLX1s has a 6.7" HD+ display (1600x720) with 90Hz refresh rate and Asahi Dragontrail Glass for durability.

query: What hardware switches does the FLX1s have?
keyword: hardware switches, kill switches, privacy switches
response: The FLX1s has 3 hardware switches on the right side. From bottom to top: Microphone, Modem/GPS, and Camera. DOWN = OFF (disengaged/disconnected), UP = ON (engaged/connected). These physically disconnect the components for privacy.

query: What happens if I toggle a hardware switch while an app is using it?
keyword: switch toggle, kill switch issue, hardware switch problem
response: Toggling a hardware switch while an app is actively using that feature may cause unexpected behavior or app crashes. The OS loses the connection to the hardware. Usually closing and reopening the app fixes this. In rare cases, a reboot may be needed.

query: What is the FLX1s made of?
keyword: materials, build quality, construction
response: The FLX1s features a glass back cover, polycarbonate mid frame, and metal keys. It has life waterproofing (splash resistant, not submersible).

query: Is the FLX1s waterproof?
keyword: waterproof, water resistant, splash proof
response: The FLX1s has life waterproofing - it's resistant to splashes but should not be submerged in water.

query: Is there a case for the FLX1s?
keyword: phone case, protective case, rubber case, cover
response: Yes! FuriLabs offers a custom rubber case for the FLX1s with the FuriLabs logo on the back. It has precise cutouts for all buttons, hardware switches, microphones, and speakers. Available at furilabs.com/phone-case-flx1s/

query: Can I order phones in bulk for my business?
keyword: bulk order, enterprise, business, mdm, fleet
response: Yes! VoidPhone.com offers bulk phone orders with enterprise features: custom logos, MDM (Mobile Device Management), dedicated software store, app version testing with Branchy, GPS phone location, remote wipe, and more. Visit VoidPhone.com for details.

query: What is VoidPhone?
keyword: voidphone, enterprise phones, business phones
response: VoidPhone.com provides enterprise Linux phone solutions including bulk orders with custom branding, MDM (Mobile Device Management), dedicated app stores, Branchy app testing, GPS tracking, and remote wipe capabilities.

query: Do I have to pay VAT or customs on my order?
keyword: vat, customs, gst, import tax, duties
response: VAT, GST, and customs duties are the customer's responsibility and are not included in the order price. Fees vary by country - some countries like Germany and other EU countries may have significant import costs. We don't control what your country charges for overseas purchases.

query: How much does shipping cost?
keyword: shipping cost, delivery cost, shipping price
response: We offer a global flat fee of $27 USD per 500g. The exact delivery cost is calculated automatically when placing your order. Make sure to include your phone number in shipping details so couriers can contact you. Verify your address with Google Maps to avoid shipping issues - post code and city must match.

query: How long does shipping take?
keyword: shipping time, delivery time, how long, when arrive
response: Estimated delivery: 9 business days (90% of orders) to 15 business days (98% of orders). We select the best shipping provider for each country.

query: How do I track my order?
keyword: order tracking, track shipment, where is my order
response: Once your order is dispatched, your account will be updated with tracking information. You can monitor the shipment's route and know when to expect delivery.

query: What countries do you ship to?
keyword: shipping countries, international shipping, where ship
response: We ship worldwide except to Iran and North Korea. Shipping costs and delivery times are calculated at checkout based on your location.

query: Does the FLX1 / FLX1s work with US carriers?
keyword: usa carriers, verizon, at&t, t-mobile, american carriers
response: T-Mobile and T-Mobile MVNOs (like Ting) work well. Verizon does NOT work - they only allow whitelisted phones. AT&T has registration and data issues. T-Mobile works great on the East Coast.

query: What carriers work with the FLX1 / FLX1s?
keyword: carriers, mobile network, sim card, which carrier
response: Confirmed working carriers include: USA: T-Mobile, Ting. Canada: Rogers, Fido, Freedom Mobile. Australia: Telstra and MVNOs. UK: Three (SMARTY), Lebara. Germany: Vodafone, Telekom, Congstar, AldiTalk, Blau.de. See full list at furilabs.com/forum/flx1/confirmed-carriers/

query: What carriers work in Europe with the FLX1 / FLX1s?
keyword: europe carriers, eu carriers, european networks
response: Germany: Vodafone, Telekom, Congstar, AldiTalk, Blau.de (O2). UK: Three (SMARTY), Lebara. France: Orange. Romania: Vodafone, Orange. Finland: DNA, Telia, Elisa. Austria: A1, Magenta, Drei. Czech: o2. Italy: TIM, Wind Tre, Iliad.

query: What carriers work in Latin America with the FLX1 / FLX1s?
keyword: latin america, central america, south america, mexico carriers
response: Colombia: Claro. Costa Rica: KÃ¶lbi, Claro (visit a physical store to register SIM). El Salvador: Tigo. Panama: Tigo.

query: What carriers work in Asia with the FLX1 / FLX1s?
keyword: asia carriers, india, taiwan
response: Taiwan: FarEasTone. India: Vi, Airtel.

query: What are the Three UK MMS settings for FLX1 / FLX1s?
keyword: three mms, uk mms, mms settings
response: Three UK MMS settings: APN: mob.asm.net | MMSC: http://mms.um.three.co.uk:10021/mmsc | Message Proxy: mms.three.co.uk:8799 | Username and Password: leave empty.

query: Why doesn't my FLX1 / FLX1s work on Verizon?
keyword: verizon not working, verizon problem, verizon imei
response: Verizon only allows whitelisted phones on their network. The FLX1/FLX1s is not on their whitelist and will not work. We recommend using T-Mobile or a T-Mobile MVNO in the USA instead.

query: What operating system do Furi Labs phones run?
keyword: os, operating system, linux, furios
response: Our phones run FuriOS, a Debian-based Linux mobile operating system. It uses the Phosh graphical shell and supports both native Linux apps and Android apps via a container running LineageOS 20.

query: Why does Aurora Store say apps are unavailable?
keyword: aurora store unavailable, aurora not working, aurora store down, can't download apps
response: Aurora Store requires an active Wi-Fi or mobile data connection. It is an external store that FuriLabs does not manage. While it works most of the time, it can occasionally have issues outside of our control. If apps show as "Unavailable", they may require Google Play Services or be device-restricted.

query: How do I turn off the volume button click sound?
keyword: volume click, volume sound, touch feedback, button sound
response: Go to Settings > Sound and scroll down to find Touch feedback. Toggle this off to disable the click sound when adjusting volume or interacting with the screen.

query: Why can't I see all folders when connected via MTP?
keyword: mtp folders missing, mtp not showing, usb file access, can't see downloads
response: MTP mode may not expose all subdirectories on some systems. For full file access, use SSH/SFTP instead. Install openssh-server with sudo apt install openssh-server, then connect from your computer using an SFTP client like FileZilla or Nautilus (sftp://furios@phone-ip).

query: Why isn't my phone charging with my USB-C cable?
keyword: not charging, usb cable charging, charging problem, cable not working
response: Some USB-C cables are data-only or have limited power delivery capability. The cable supplied with your FLX1/FLX1s is verified for proper charging. If your phone isn't charging with a third-party cable, try the original cable or a known USB-C Power Delivery compatible cable.

query: How do I verify my shipping address before ordering?
keyword: verify address, check address, shipping address, google maps, post code
response: Before placing your order, verify your shipping address using Google Maps to avoid shipping issues. Make sure your post code and city match. Include your phone number so couriers can contact you.

query: Why won't the payment go through?
keyword: payment not working, can't pay, checkout problem, payment failed
response: If you're having trouble with payment: 1) Disable all ad blockers and privacy extensions. 2) Use the latest version of Firefox or Chrome. 3) As a last resort, try using private/incognito browsing mode.

query: Why can't I log in to my account?
keyword: can't login, login problem, account login, password not working
response: If you created an account but can't log in, please check your email for a verification link. You must validate your email address before you can log in. Check your spam/junk folder if you don't see it in your inbox.

query: Can I checkout as a guest without creating an account?
keyword: guest checkout, no account, buy without account, guest purchase
response: We do not offer guest checkout. An account is required so we can provide you with support and warranty service for your purchase.

query: Can I pay with Bitcoin or other alternative payment methods?
keyword: bitcoin, crypto, cryptocurrency, ethereum, dogecoin, venmo, cashapp, alternative payment
response: We do not support alternative payment methods such as Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, Venmo, Cash App, or other similar services. We accept standard credit/debit card payments through our checkout.

query: How do I SSH into my phone?
response: First install the SSH packages: sudo apt install openssh-server usb-tethering -y. Plug in a USB-C cable to your computer and then ssh furios@10.15.19.82. Alternatively you may need to go Settings > System > Secure Shell and toggle it on. Finally to connect over WiFi, get your IP from Settings > Wi-Fi > Connected Wifi > Click the Gear icon

query: Are other operating systems supported?
response: The Furi Labs team is simply not big enough to support other operating systems other than FuriOS which is fine tuned for our products such as the FLX1. While users are welcome to port other operating systems to the device and use it as they wish, our team does not have enough man power to support this.

query: How to access USB Mass Storage Device
response: To use the device storage in your computer over cable, you can go to settings->USB and enable MTP and change USB state to MTP

query: I bricked my phone because I did something
response: You can boot into the recovery environment and do a factory reset which should get the device to a working state

query: Whats the difference between the stable and testing branches?
response: Stable is considered our user ready FuriOS and testing can break or have features that have not been tested and can have unpredictable results.

query: Can I use Android apps?
response: Yes. FuriOS allows for running apps inside a container running Android codenamed Andromeda. This container has complete integration with the host and makes all Android applications work like native applications

query: How can I use the Ticket Box feature?
response: Open up the app Mobile Settings Scroll to Lockscreen and enable ticket box Select a directory to place your PDF's

query: How do I open up the keyboard manually
response: You can open the keyboard by holding on the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen

query: How do I back up my phone?
response: It is recommended to back up your phone before any monthly update. You can do it easily by following the below steps. Open up a terminal and navigate to the path where you want to save the backup. Download your $HOME directory via scp -r furios@FLX1_IP:/home/furios .

query: Is the device carrier unlocked?
response: All Furi Labs devices are carrier unlocked internationally.

query: What is my Wifi IP Address?
response: The IP is obtained via DHCP on your network usually. Get your IP from Settings > Wifi > Connected Wifi > Click the Gear icon See the SSH FAQ to connect.

query: How do I contribute to the FAQ?
keyword: add faq, contribute faq, submit faq, update faq
response: You can contribute by submitting a Pull Request to our GitHub repo at https://github.com/FuriLabs/faq/. Fork the repo, add your entry to faq.csv following the format (id, language, category, query, keyword, response, enabled), and submit a PR. Visit https://furilabs.com/new-faqs for detailed instructions.

query: How do I contact support for order issues?
keyword: order problem, order issue, defective, damaged, broken, replacement, warranty, rma, contact support
response: Send email to orders@furilabs.com with subject "Order 123456" and your issue. Replace 123456 with your order number and use the email you signed up with. Please attach pictures of the issue. We will fix it.

query: How do I disable Wi-Fi MAC address randomization?
keyword: MAC, static, random
response: Go to Settings, Wi-Fi, Saved Networks OR Visible Networks section, select the gear icon for the SSID, go to the Identity tab, and set Cloned Address to permanent (to use the device's actual MAC address) or stable (to always use the same generated MAC address for this network), then click Apply.

query: How do I enable Wi-Fi MAC address randomization?
keyword: MAC, random
response: Go to Settings, Wi-Fi, Saved Networks OR Visible Networks section, select the gear icon for the SSID, go to the Identity tab, set Cloned Address to random (to generate a new MAC address upon each connect), then click Apply.

query: How do I spoof a specific MAC address?
keyword: MAC, spoof, static, clone
response: Go to Settings, Wi-Fi, Saved Networks OR Visible Networks section, select the gear icon for the SSID, go to the Identity tab, enter the specific MAC to spoof in Cloned Address, then click Apply.

query: Can I use banking apps on FuriOS?
keyword: banking, bank
response: This depends on your bank, some may work out of the box. You can try spoofing a device via the Aurora store if it doesn't.

query: My app is complaining about rooted Android?
keyword: root, rooted, rooting, play integrity, play integrity API
response: There is little that can be done about this. You can try spoofing a device via the Aurora store.
